body:
As some people are getting annoyed with the spammy threads,
instead of the attention seeking (sometimes) threads, alert your friends and the community  when you are leaving on this thread instead so there is no forum spam


Users who are no longer with us on Avicus: :c
 Rokillers
 buster_U
Tekcrezec162
